title: Can I download themes to my phone? Does my phone support live wallpapers?
answer:
No themes can be installed to your phone, but your phone supports live wallpapers. 

 To select a live wallpaper, touch and hold the home screen. From the displayed dialog box, touch Wallpapers. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112794) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112795)

 On the Wallpaper screen, touch Home screen wallpaper then Live Wallpapers. From the displayed screen, select a wallpaper. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112796)
